  • Method Details

    • drawStudents

      public EnumMap<Colour,Integer> drawStudents(int num)
      This method is used to randomly draw num students from the bag
      Parameters:
      num - int number of students to randomly draw
      Returns:
      Colour EnumMap of Integer, containing the drawn student disks (the EnumMap contains for each Colour the corresponding Integer number of drawn student disks)
